mapper.insert: INSERT INTO partnerjoin(partnerId, partnerPw, partnerName, businessNum, partnerMobile, partnerEmail) VALUES(#{partnerId},#{partnerPw},#{partnerName},#{businessNum},#{partnerMobile},#{partnerEmail})
mapper.update: update partnerjoin set partnerPw=#{partnerPw}, partnerName=#{partnerName}, businessNum=#{businessNum}, partnerMobile=#{partnerMobile}, partnerEmail=#{partnerEmail} where partnerId=#{partnerId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM partnerjoin WHERE partnerId=#{partnerId}
select * from reservation where partnerId = #{partnerId} order by reservation_date
select count(*) from question where pensionName=#{pensionName}
